mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project (github_id, name, full_name, owner_id, html_url, description, language, stargazers_count, forks_count, watchers_count, project_rank, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{githubId}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{ownerId}, #{htmlUrl}, #{description}, #{language}, #{stargazersCount}, #{forksCount}, #{watchersCount}, #{projectRank}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE project SET name = #{name}, full_name = #{fullName}, owner_id = #{ownerId}, html_url = #{htmlUrl}, description = #{description}, language = #{language}, stargazers_count = #{stargazersCount}, forks_count = #{forksCount}, watchers_count = #{watchersCount}, project_rank = #{projectRank}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE github_id = #{githubId}
